import {useSelector, useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import { addPreference,removePreference,getPopularityListing } from "../redux/actions"; import { useState } from "react"; import Listing from "./Listing"; const Search = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const updatePreference = (language) => { (language.target.checked) ? dispatch(addPreference(language.target.value)): dispatch(removePreference(language.target.value)); } return( <>
